name: dev (docker-compose)
postCreateCommand:
sh -lc "mkdir -p ~/.ssh && chmod 700 ~/.ssh; cat > ~/.ssh/config <<'EOF'
Host github.com
  HostName github.com
  User git
  IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_ed25519_github
  IdentitiesOnly yes
  StrictHostKeyChecking accept-new
EOF
chmod 600 ~/.ssh/config; git config --global user.name \"fuisl\"; git config --global user.email \"135719107+fuisl@users.noreply.github.com\"; git config --global core.sshCommand \"ssh -i ~/.ssh/id_ed25519_github -o IdentitiesOnly=yes -o StrictHostKeyChecking=accept-new\""
